text: Write code like the maintainer would be a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Stiv Makkonnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the ability of the programmer.
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's Laws

text: Walking on water and developing software following the ToR is very easy... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

text: There is no secret ingredient. <...> To do something special, you just have to believe that it is something special.
author: Kung Fu Panda

text: Personality is created not by what a person hears and says, but by labor and activity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: A program that doesn't work usually does less harm than a program that doesn't work well.
author: Andy Hunt and Dave Thomas

text: A lot of times people don't know what they want until you show it to them.
author: Steve Jobs

text: If you want to sell a cat to a computer specialist, say it is object oriented
author: R. King

text: People should do what they are passionate about. It will make them happier than anything else.
author: Elon Musk

text: Work like hell. Work 80 to 100 hours a week to increase your chances of success. If other people work 40-hour workweeks and you work 100 hours, then even if you do the same thing, you will achieve in four months what others will need a year to achieve.
author: Elon Musk
